turns.question: During any ICU stay for patient 12568, has any foley output been recorded in the last 260 days?

turns.question: In patient 14467, during this ICU stay, is the second most recent heart rate lower than the most recent heart rate?

turns.question: Is the most recent heart rate still higher than the preceding value?

turns.question: Over the past 38 months, on each day, what was the largest single infusion amount of .9% normal saline given to patient 25493 during ICU stays?
turns.query: select max(inputevents_cv.amount) from inputevents_cv where inputevents_cv.icustay_id in ( select icustays.icustay_id from icustays where icustays.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 25493 ) ) and inputevents_cv.itemid in ( select d_items.itemid from d_items where d_items.label = '.9% normal saline' and d_items.linksto = 'inputevents_cv' ) and datetime(inputevents_cv.charttime) >= datetime('2103-10-10 23:00:00','-38 month') group by strftime('%y-%m-%d',inputevents_cv.charttime)

turns.question: Has the maximum daily .9% normal saline infusion amount changed?
